resources.string: 25w14craftmine is a Minecraft Java Edition April Fools\' snapshot released on March 30, 2025, based on the 1.20.4 version. This snapshot introduces a crafting system that allows players to craft anything from anything, as long as they have enough materials.

24w14potato is a Minecraft Java Edition April Fools\' snapshot released on March 29, 2024, based on the 1.20.4 version. This snapshot introduces a new dimension called the Potato Dimension, where everything is made of potatoes.

23w13a_or_b is a Minecraft Java Edition April Fools\' snapshot released on March 31, 2023, based on the 1.19.4 version. This snapshot introduces two new dimensions, A and B, which are randomly chosen when the player enters a portal.

22w13oneBlockAtATime is a Minecraft Java Edition April Fools\' snapshot released on March 31, 2022, based on the 1.18.2 version. This snapshot introduces a new game mode where players can only break and place one block at a time.

20w14infinite is a Minecraft Java Edition April Fools\' snapshot released on April 1, 2020, based on the 1.15.2 version. This snapshot introduces a new dimension called the Infinite Dimension, which is an endless world with no boundaries.

Minecraft 3D Shareware v1.34 is a Minecraft Java Edition April Fools\' snapshot released on April 1, 2019, based on the 1.14.2 version. This snapshot introduces a new game mode that mimics the classic shareware games of the 1990s.

1.RV-Pre1 is a Minecraft Java Edition April Fools\' snapshot released on April 1, 2016, based on the 1.9 version. This snapshot introduces a new update called The Trendy Update, which adds various trendy features to the game.

15w14a is a Minecraft Java Edition April Fools\' snapshot released on April 1, 2015, based on the 1.8.3 version. This snapshot introduces a new update called The Love and Hugs Update, which adds various love and hug-related features to the game.
